events.1788: Sindhia arrested Gulam Qadir and killed him.
events.1881: Pundit Sunder Lal Sharma, freedom fighter and social reformer, was born at Rajim, M.P.
events.1903: Bhalchandra Digambar Garware, famous industrailist, was born.
events.1921: Praphulchandra Natwarlal Bhagwati, justice of Supreme Court, was born.
events.1929: Indian National Congress convenes in Lahore.
events.1952: Saifuddin Kitchlu awarded the Lenin Peace Prize of U.S.S.R. Award. He was the first Indian to receive this honour.
events.1956: The Hindu Adoption Sub-Act 1956 was accepted.
events.1974: Inssatvahana, the first establishment to give submarine training,  was commissioned at Visakhapatnam.
events.1989: V. P. Singh wins vote of confidence in the Lok Sabha.
events.1990: Former Union Finance Secretary S. Venkatramanan appointed Governor of RBI. B. Rachaiah and Dr. Sarup Singh sworn in as Governors of Kerala and Gujarat respectively.
events.1992: BJP-sponsored no-trust motion against the Rao Government defeated 334-106 in the Lok Sabha; Vajpayee ends fast.
events.1993: JPC indicts RBI and Finance Ministry in the multi-crore security scam.
events.1994: The IAF return from peace keeping duties as part of the Indian contingent supporting UN operations in Somalia.
events.1998: The Viswabharati University in Calcutta presents the 'Deshikottama' award to Nobel laureate Prof. Amartya Sen.
events.1999: The Manisana Wage Board for Journalists and Non-Journalists of Newspapers presents tentative proposals to the Government.
